name: 黃希敏
objective: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
schedule:
01  Introduction
02  Yule 1: Definitions and background
03  Yule 2: Deixis and distance
04  Yule 3: Reference and inference
05  Yule 4: Presupposition and entailment
06  Yule 5: Cooperation and implication
07  Yule 6: Speech acts and events
08  Yule 7: Politeness and interaction
09  Yule 8: Conversation and preference structure
10  Yule 9: Discourse and culture + Peccei 1: What is Pragmatics (Presentation)
11  Cutting, pp. 53-64 + Peccei 2: Entailment (Presentation)
12  Cutting, pp. 65-74 + Peccei 3: Presuppositon (Presentation)
13  Cutting, pp. 76-87 +Peccei 4: The co-operative principle & implicature (Presentation)
14  Cutting, pp. 87-103a + Peccei 5: More on implicatures (Presentation)
15  Cutting, pp. 87-103b + Peccei 6: Speech acts (Presentation)
16  Cutting, pp. 169-187a + Peccei 7: More about speech acts (Presentation)
17  Cutting, pp. 169-187b + Peccei 8: Politeness (Presentation) [+ Peccei 9: Making Sense (Presentation)]
materials:
Textbook 1
Yule: Pragmatics (Oxford)
Textbook 2
Cutting: Pragmatics and Discourse, 2nd Ed.(2010) (Routlege)
Textbook 3
Peccei: Pragmatics (Routledge)
